sense.def:
Restraints
so pravila ali pogoji, ki nekoga ali nekaj omejujejo.

seg.quote: The king suffered few restraints on his freedom of action.
...an agreed policy of income and price restraint.

sense.def:
Restraint
je mirno, obvladano vedênje, pri katerem ne pokažemo čustev.

seg.quote: ‘Dear me,’ he said with splendid restraint.
